website_summaries.verdict: Art deco lamp with stained glass pieces.
pros: Attractive multi-colored shade gives off a pleasing light
cons: Adjustable shade sometimes slips from its position

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lamp! Great quality. The pull chain works well to turn it off and on. The paint job is perfect. I really love it and would recommend buying this one. I can't find any issues whatsoever. It's a nice, sturdy build.
customer_reviews.author: aolande1

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!!!
customer_reviews.text: I always read 1 and 5 star reviews before ordering.If all I ever read were 1 stars I'd never order anything.This exceeds my expectations .I have a unique Computer area(Complicated) so after many attempts at other lighting scenarios ..I or You nailed it.I was Hoping this wasn't made in China but it is but sometimes you get Lucky.It also works as a great nightlight when I'm not on the Computer.2 thumbs up and 5 plus Stars.
customer_reviews.author: Charlane Valade

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lamp
customer_reviews.text: Got this same lamp shipped to me broken by another etailer. Amazon delivered. Beautiful lamp. Works great. Other side of shade is all white.
customer_reviews.author: ReagansDad

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bargain
customer_reviews.text: Lovely desk lamp with a solid base. The glass is beautiful and well cut. Seems to work well with the 250 lumen LED bulb we put in it, though it could easily handle 400 lumens. Great deal for a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Will VONDAUSTER

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fully illuminate
customer_reviews.text: Only 2/3 of shade illuminates due to the placement of the bulb housing. Also? The bulb housing is a very tight fit. Used 3 different recommended bulbs. All were very difficult to screw in and keep lined up with thread. Cheap.
customer_reviews.author: C Harper

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish light
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and useful bought it for a coworker who does nails she loved it
customer_reviews.author: Guyseekinglife

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp. Lights up my desk nicely and looks ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice lamp. Lights up my desk nicely and looks nice as well. The glass is very heavy. I have not had the problems others reported of the lamp not staying in place, however, I set the angle of the shade to light my desk and do not move it.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I got this lamp as an apartment warming gift. Presently, it sits on my desk and illuminates my workspace. This is not meant to light up a room, but rather to provide the perfect amount for late night studying. The stained glass work looks excellent even when the light is off. When it is on, the shade has a beautiful appearance. I tried it with a traditional incandescent bulb and the coiled energy efficient one and definitely prefer the latter. Also, shipment was fast and undamaged. Great product, great vendor :)
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Put a little Tiffany in your life!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely in person! Wanted it for my office desk and didn't want the commercial bendy kind. Well packaged and shipping was quick.
customer_reviews.author: Bojest

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality - all metal and glass. No plastic. Pull chain feels sturdy. Really perfect
customer_reviews.author: Gooch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp - was perfect size for the area that I needed. Beautiful colors!!!!
customer_reviews.author: B B, Houston

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for the Husband's home office desk. He loves it and almost always has it on.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Bedford

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty lamp!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a pretty lamp. I have mine on my desk at work. I get so many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Seavers

customer_reviews.title: I get lots of compliments on how beautiful it is
customer_reviews.text: Just gorgeous! I get lots of compliments on how beautiful it is.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie M. Renick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is exactly what I was looking for. It gives off the perfect amount of light for working. I love the colors and it is very sturdy. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia McKee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for above our upright (cabinet) piano. Bulbs were easy to find too!
customer_reviews.author: Jazz lover

customer_reviews.title: I got this as a Christmas present and absolutely love it. It is one of my favorite pieces ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas present and absolutely love it. It is one of my favorite pieces in my home! Beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Heather C.

customer_reviews.title: i got this very pretty tiffany lamp but the shade is stripped the shade ...
customer_reviews.text: i got this very pretty tiffany lamp but the shade is stripped the shade will not stay in place it just swings around and it had nuts on it but it will not tighten up but to late to send back the reason i waited so long to tell the company my husband passed away and my mind was not on the lamp it is a shame it can not be tighten up my son tried
customer_reviews.author: linda  asa

customer_reviews.title: Bolts that hold the glass shade do not hold it ...
customer_reviews.text: Bolts that hold the glass shade do not hold it tight enough so the shade tilts/spins when you don't want it to.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Cefalu

customer_reviews.title: beautiful lamp. It is illuminating my Jesus Christ and ...
customer_reviews.text: beautiful lamp. It is illuminating my Jesus Christ and Virgin Mary Shrine very beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tiffany Desk Lamp
customer_reviews.text: It is absolutely beautiful and I love it! It is exactly what I was looking for and I couldn't be happier with this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Vida Turner-Thibault

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional.
customer_reviews.text: I've spent money on a succession of ugly little desk lamps that fall apart. While I'm not sure how long this one will last, it's solidly made--glass and metal--and, more importantly, it is lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Caveat Emptor

customer_reviews.title: I HAD TO INSERT GLUE TO THIS ITEM
customer_reviews.text: 1 THE GLASS HEAD DOES NOT STAND THE WAY Ý WANT. IT MOVES DOWNWORDS 2- I HAD TO GLUE THE STEM (main body ) SO AS TO MAKE IT STICK TO THE RIGHT ARM
customer_reviews.author: Cemal

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: My only problem is the shade won't stay in up position so it's not very maneuverable ...Stand is nice and heavy and obviously a quality lamp...also got a larger one for a table.....These are so gorgeous and classy!
customer_reviews.author: pianopris

product_meta.title: Warehouse of Tiffany KS20MB50 12-inch Stained Glass Desk Lamp with Blue Gemstones, One Size, Multi-Color
product_meta.description:
This uniquely designed lamp in a delicate floral pattern is constructed from dazzling, finely cut stained glass and embellished with blue stone accents. This beautiful piece casts the perfect glow at a small desk or entry table.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Tiffany Style Art Glass Banker Lamp. The primary colors are Blue, Green, red and pink. The dimensions are 10-Inch L by 13-Inch H by 10-Inch W. It has pull chain switch in it. It has more than 100pieces Of cut glass. It requires I bulb. Max of 60watts. The base is white zinc metal. It has more than 100pieces of cut glass. Each glass is individually cut wrap around copper foil and sottered together.
feature_bullets: Requires two (2) 60-watt type A bulbs (not included)
Overall dimensions: 12 inches high x 6 inches diameter
Shade dimensions: 8 inches wide x 5. 5 inches tall
